entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: fortunes #57717
  • Bad request / validation errors by the framework should state field names according to RFC 9457 #57714
    Backlog
  • JsonPatchDocument `.ApplyTo(...)` raises `JsonPatchException` for unknown Properties instead of transparently mapping them to `JsonExtensionData` #57711
  • Kestrel RemoteCertificateValidationCallback client IP. #57710
  • Blazor Web App - IIS - App shutdown on refresh - HTTP Error 503.0 - Server has been shutdown #57707
  • Different model binding behaviour for nullable query params with default value in asp net core #57705
  • Blazor: the parent component always is disposed before the child components. #57704
  • We are running into "InvalidOperationException: Unable to resolve service for type" issues but from what we can see the code seems right? #57703
  • Close outdated milestones #57702
  • asp-all-route-data value should not be changed #57701
  • Perf regression: fortunes #57700

Closed

  • Consistent naming of settings files #57509
  • Memory leak in my .NET 6 Web API running in docker container in AWS #57638
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter #57699
  • I'm stuck in "Interact with data in Blazor web apps" learning path. #57675
    .NET 10 Planning
  • ASP0019: Trailing trivia after IHeaderDictionary causes formatting issues with "Use indexer" code fix #57648
  • IFormFile parameters aren't set as required in OpenAPI documentation #57712
  • WithOpenApi cannot be used to set Summary and Description in OpenAPI documentation #57713
  • Static Pages should support Interactive components fully #57709
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #57696
  • ValidateOnStart doesn't validate Options on startup #56453
  • Regarding the Blazor <InputSelect> @bind-value and @onchange event handler #57575
  • Multiple Unhandled Exceptions thrown in statics.teams file #57569

PullRequests

Created

  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.SignalR.Client` package README #57718
    area-signalr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #57716
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Invoke inbound activity handlers on circuit initialization #57715
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.x

Merged

  • [release/9.0] [Blazor] Invoke inbound activity handlers on circuit initialization #57678
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 9.0-rc2
  • Remove trailing trivia from IHeaderDictionary in "Use indexer" code fix #57649
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, area-networking, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • ApiExplorer Support for HttpResults types for Controllers #57464
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Feature/httpendpoint #57565
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Disable launching browser on Web API template #57682
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc
  • Use System.Threading.Lock in Kestrel #57236
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Microsoft.extensions.api description.server allow specifying environment #55836
    area-mvc, area-commandlinetools, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1
  • Fix code generation for parsing optional array parameters in RequestDelegateGenerator #57336
    community-contribution, feature-rdg, area-minimal, area-networking
  • feat: extending `ApiBehaviorOptions` with skip `SkipStatusCodePages` #57597
    area-mvc, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Quarantine ProcessAsync_AwaitersUseTheResultOfExecutor #57568
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fix typo in `RemoteUserAccount` triple slash #57443
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
